ABOUT SKILLS EXPERIENCE CONTACT

Marketing Consultant
DESIREE SANCHEZ
Los Angeles, Ca

About Me

Desiree helps other Entrepreneurs and businesses grow through website design and development, and better marketing. Over 13 years experience researching, strategizing, and executing comprehensive marketing plans. My digital marketing plans encompassed website development with SEO/SEM, display advertising, social media, and email marketing. I have helped design and launch new branding across marketing collateral, apparel, vehicles, and tradeshow events. My additional experience includes event planning, brand positioning, experiential marketing, direct mail, writing and editing press releases/articles, promotional product designs, print/radio advertising, vendor relations, and with a coding background customized and launched a Microsoft Dynamics CRM platform. When I'm not working or volunteering, I enjoy live music, traveling, kickboxing, dancing, golfing, and hiking every chance I get!
